an10.33:1: "Bhante, how many qualities should a bhikkhu possess to be agreed upon to adjudicatein a disciplinary issue?"[n.2035]Ubbāhikā. DOP defines as "the reference (of a dispute) to a committee of selected bhikkhus."Mp:"Adjudicationmeans picking out, selecting from the Saṅgha to settle a disciplinary issue that has arisen"(sampatta-adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ saṅghato ubbāhitvā uddharitvā gahaṇatthāya). The procedure is described in detail at Vin II 95,25–97,6.
